description: Housed within The Box, a multi-functional space that is home to vintage cars and contemporary art works surrounded by a garden with splendid olive trees, this restaurant serves excellent fish and seafood (there’s also a bistro serving quicker lunches from Tuesday to Friday). The delicious, substantial dishes are prepared using top-quality ingredients and a focus on traditional recipes with just the right amount of creativity. Pastas, risottos, fried dishes and soups all feature, followed by an excellent selection of desserts.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace, Wheelchair access
